name: kitchencoach-2.0
description: Restaurant training, safety, and compliance platform - responsive web + iPad PWA

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=client && npm run build --workspace=server
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=client && npm run test --workspace=server
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=client && npm run lint --workspace=server
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint -- --fix --workspace=client && npm run lint -- --fix --workspace=server
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=client && npm run type-check --workspace=server
scripts.quality-check: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test && npm run audit:prod
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace=client && npm run clean --workspace=server && rm -rf reports/
scripts.fresh-install: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules */node_modules && npm ci

author: KitchenCoach Team
